;===============================================================
;== ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_actor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= odeon
          and Trait DramasFanGreekVice > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary actor chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_aged_retainer
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Personality_Loyal >= 2

    AcquireAncillary aged_retainer chance  20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_agriculturalist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_farming_large_temple
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary agriculturalist chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_animal_trader
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stone_amphitheatre
          and Trait GamesFanRomanVice >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary animal_trader chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_architect
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Trait ArchitectSkill >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= foundry
          and Trait BattleScarred >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary armourer chance  4

          and Trait BattleScarred <= 1
          and IsGeneral

Trigger trigger_pet_monkey
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and not AgentType = merchant

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pet_white_cat
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_justice_awesome_temple
          and AgentType = assassin

    AcquireAncillary pet_white_cat chance  9 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_philosopher
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait PhilosophySkill >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary philosopher chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_physician
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= baths
          ;and Trait PoorHealth >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary physician chance  9 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_playwright
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = theatre
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait DramasFanGreekVice >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary playwright chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_poet
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= odeon
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary poet chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_poisoner
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition Trait Paranoia >= 2
          and Trait DeceiverVirtue >= 1
          and AgentType = assassin

    AcquireAncillary poisoner chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pontifex
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple
          and not Trait PublicFaith >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary pontifex chance  9 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = royal_barracks
          and Trait Personality_Disloyal >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary praetorian_guardsman chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_problem_mother
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait AuthoritarianRomanVirtue >= 1

    AcquireAncillary problem_mother chance  6

          and Trait GoodTaxman >= 1
          and IsGeneral

          and Trait EnemyTerritory >= 3

Trigger trigger_roman_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 60
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and Attribute Influence >= 4
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary roman_turncoat chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_runner
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not Routs
          and WonBattle
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary runner chance  4

          and Trait NonAuthoritarian >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary satirist chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_scout
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WasAttacker
          and InBarbarianLands
          and Trait Paranoia >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary scout chance  40 

;------------------------------------------

          and RemainingMPPercentage < 10

          and Trait Insane >= 2
          and IsGeneral

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_shieldbearer
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 80
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary shieldbearer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright

    AcquireAncillary shipwright chance  3

    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation

    AcquireAncillary slave_trader chance  8

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Prudent < 2

    Condition not WonBattle
        and Trait Superstitious >= 1

          and Trait SpyMaster = 0

          and FatherTrait Ignorance <= 1

          and WonBattle
          and not Routs

          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and IsGeneral

    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 40
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad
          and IsGeneral

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_warlord_scythia
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 45
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType scythia
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_warlord_scythia
          and Attribute Command >= 4

    AcquireAncillary office_warlord_scythia chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_warlord_dacia
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 45
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType dacia
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_warlord_dacia
          and Attribute Command >= 4

    AcquireAncillary office_warlord_dacia chance  100

Trigger trigger_priest_of_Aphrodite
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_forge_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_forge_pantheon
          and CultureType greek
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not FactionType seleucid
          and Trait KindRuler > 0

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Aphrodite chance  15

Trigger culturalimport1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not IsFromFaction slave

    RemoveAncillary  ArmenianApricotsEffect   chance 100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger culturalimport1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not IsFromFaction slave
          and HasAncillary ArmenianApricots
          and RegionTradingResource textiles

    AcquireAncillary ArmenianApricotsEffect chance 100 



;------------------------------------------
Trigger culturalimport2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementMerchantTradingWith britons
          and not IsFromFaction britons

    AcquireAncillary BritishCuisine chance 15 


;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = admiral 
          and SettlementMerchantTradingWith carthage
          and not IsFromFaction carthage

    AcquireAncillary PhoenicianSeamanship chance 35

;===============================================================
;== Section - Seleucid Satrapy Ancillaries Triggers           ==
;===============================================================
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Medias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Ekbatana
          and I_SettlementOwner Rhagai = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Medias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Medias chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Babylonias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Seleukeia
          and I_SettlementOwner Doura-Europos = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Uruk = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Babylonias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Babylonias chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Persidos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Istakhr
          and I_SettlementOwner Alexandreia-Karmania = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Persidos
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Persidos chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Sousianes
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Susa
          and I_SettlementOwner Charax = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Sousianes
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Sousianes chance  100 
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Syrias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Antioch
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Syrias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Syrias chance  100
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Parthias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Hekatompylos
          and I_SettlementOwner Zadracarta = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Parthias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Parthias chance  100     
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Armenias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Carcathiocerta
          and I_SettlementOwner Armavir = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Tushpa = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Arsarata = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Armenias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Armenias chance  100       
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrapes_tes_Aigyptou
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Alexandria
          and I_SettlementOwner Thebes = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Memphis = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Paraitonion = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Ptolemais = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrapes_tes_Aigyptou
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Satrapes_tes_Aigyptou chance  100    
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Epi_tes_Mikres_Asias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and Trait Seleucid > 0
          and SettlementName Sardis
          and I_SettlementOwner Apameia = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Ikonion = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Sagalassos = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Ephesos = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Epi_tes_Mikres_Asias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Epi_tes_Mikres_Asias chance  100        
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Strategos_tes_Makedonias
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType seleucid
          and Trait City_Has_Governor >= 1
          and SettlementName Pella
          and I_SettlementOwner Larissa = seleucid
          and I_SettlementOwner Amphipolis = seleucid
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Strategos_tes_Makedonias
          and Attribute TrainingAnimalUnits < 1
          
    AcquireAncillary Strategos_tes_Makedonias chance  100


;------------------------------------------
; NEW TRIGGERS FROM VANILLA ENHANCEMENT MOD
;------------------------------------------
    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_evil_mother-in-law
    WhenToTest CharacterMarries
    Condition Trait Girls >= 1
          and Trait Gambling >= 1
          and Trait Drink >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command <= 5

    AcquireAncillary evil_mother-in-law chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_floozy
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait Girls >= 1
          and Trait Brave >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary floozy chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_inflatable_sheep
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and InBarbarianLands
          and Trait Insane >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 95

    AcquireAncillary inflatable_sheep chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Navigator2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition RemainingMPPercentage < 10
          and IsAdmiral

    AcquireAncillary Navigator2 chance  11 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pet_monkey2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait GoodSpy >= 3

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey2 chance  16 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Tanit2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_farming_temple
          and FactionType numidia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Tanit chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_justice_temple
          and FactionType numidia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Baal chance  15

;------------------------------------------

Trigger trigger_governor_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and I_SettlementOwner Tingi = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_01

    AcquireAncillary governor_01 chance 80
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and I_SettlementOwner Gades = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_02

    AcquireAncillary governor_02 chance 80
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_03

    AcquireAncillary governor_03 chance 80
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and I_SettlementOwner Rome = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_04

    AcquireAncillary governor_04 chance 80

;== EVENT RELATED ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_marius_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Arretium
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_marius_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Ancona
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Ancona = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_marius_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Tarentum
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Tarentum = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_marius_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Capua
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Capua = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Croton
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Maleventum
		  and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
		  and I_SettlementOwner Maleventum = romans_julii
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary marius chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Marian_Legion_Instructor_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Arretium
	      and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
	      and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_julii
	      and not FactionwideAncillaryExists marius
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Marian_Legion_Instructor chance  100 
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Marian_Legion_Instructor_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Ancona
	      and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
	      and I_SettlementOwner Ancona = romans_julii
	      and not FactionwideAncillaryExists marius
          and FactionType romans_julii
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Marian_Legion_Instructor chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Observer_on_Romans_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Observer_on_Romans
	  and WorldwideAncillaryExists marius
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii > 0

    AcquireAncillary Observer_on_Romans chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Observer_on_Romans_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Observer_on_Romans
	  and WorldwideAncillaryExists Marian_Legion_Instructor
          and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii > 0

    AcquireAncillary Observer_on_Romans chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Supporter_of_Kingship_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Supporter_of_Kingship
          and FactionwideAncillaryExists Marian_Legion_Instructor
          and not FactionLeaderTrait Imperator > 0
          and Trait Populares > 0

    AcquireAncillary Supporter_of_Kingship chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ex-Roman_Auxillia_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
	      and WorldwideAncillaryExists Marian_Legion_Instructor
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Trait Warlord >= 2
          and FactionType germans

    AcquireAncillary Ex-Roman_Auxillia chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ex-Roman_Auxillia_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
	      and WorldwideAncillaryExists marius
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Trait Warlord >= 2
          and FactionType germans

    AcquireAncillary Ex-Roman_Auxillia chance  3 


;===============================================================
;== Ethnic Project Ancillaries Triggers START HERE =============
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
; War and Battle Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Old_Seadog
    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_naval_shrine
          
    AcquireAncillary Old_Seadog chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_First_Mate
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.0
          
    AcquireAncillary First_Mate chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Wind_reader
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and RemainingMPPercentage < 10
          and FactionType britons
          
    AcquireAncillary Wind_reader chance  2

;;Trigger trigger_Pyrotechnician
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_forge_awesome_temple
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_forge_pantheon
;;          and Trait Fire >= 1
;;          and not FactionType pontus
;;          ;;and not FactionType nabataea
;;          and not FactionType greek_cities
;;          ;;and not FactionType bosporan		  
;;          and not FactionType macedon
;;          and not FactionType seleucid
;;		  and not FactionType egypt
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Pyrotechnician chance  3 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Pyrotechnician2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and EndedInEnemyZOC
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and not FactionType sparta
          ;;and not FactionType nabataea
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType bosporan		  
          and not FactionType macedon
		  and not FactionType seleucid
		  and not FactionType egypt

    AcquireAncillary Pyrotechnician2 chance  1

Trigger trigger_Renowned_Archer_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and Trait Disciplinarian >= 1
          and FactionType britons
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Renowned_Archer chance  2

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fertility_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_fertility_pantheon
          and Trait Disciplinarian >= 1
          and FactionType britons

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Captured_Flag_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and not GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 80

    AcquireAncillary Captured_Flag chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Captured_Flag_02
    WhenToTest CapturedLegionaryEagle
    Condition not GeneralFoughtCulture roman


    AcquireAncillary Captured_Flag chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Eagle_Standard
    WhenToTest CapturedLegionaryEagle
    Condition GeneralFoughtCulture roman


    AcquireAncillary Eagle_Standard chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Spear_Carrier_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 80
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 7
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and Trait BarbarianWarriorSkill >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Spear_Carrier chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Spear_Carrier_02
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 80
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 7
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and Trait BarbarianWarriorSkill = 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Spear_Carrier chance  5

Trigger trigger_Driver_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_fun_pantheon
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= paved_roads
          and Trait Energetic >= 1
          and FactionType britons
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Driver chance 4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_horse_pantheon
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= paved_roads
          and Trait Energetic >= 1
          and FactionType britons
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Driver chance 4

Trigger trigger_Hydraulic_Engineer_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = temple_of_farming_pantheon
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and not FactionType macedon
          and Trait GoodEngineer > 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Hydraulic_Engineer chance  2

Trigger trigger_Scholar_apprentice
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_awesome_temple
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and Attribute Management > 5
          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Scholar_apprentice chance  4

;;          and FactionType britons
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Persian_Physician chance  2 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Persian_Surgeon_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and Trait Archemenid_Tradition >= 1
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Persian_Surgeon chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Persian_Surgeon_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_awesome_temple
          and Trait Archemenid_Tradition >= 1
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Persian_Surgeon chance  4

          and Trait Archemenid_Tradition >= 1
          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

Trigger trigger_Astroscholar_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ludus_magnus
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= scriptorium_sp3
          and FactionType macedon
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and FactionType sparta
          and FactionType pergamon
          and Trait Superstitious > 0

    AcquireAncillary Astroscholar chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and Trait Superstitious > 0

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ludus_magnus
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= scriptorium_sp3
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and Trait Personality_Pragmatic > 0

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_negotiator
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_large_temple
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and Trait Negotiation > 0

    AcquireAncillary negotiator chance  6

    Condition EndedInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage < 5
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Bematist chance  1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition RemainingMPPercentage < 5
          and Trait LogisticalSkill > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Bematist chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition RemainingMPPercentage < 5
          and Trait gGreat = 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Bematist chance  5

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and Treasury > 10000
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not Trait Ignorance >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Sophist chance  3

          and IsGeneral

Trigger trigger_Han_Merchant
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= silk_rd
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= curia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Han_Merchant chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
; Horse&Pet&Women Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Pet_Falcon_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Scout > 0

    AcquireAncillary Pet_Falcon chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Pet_Falcon_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and FactionType scythia
          ;and Trait BarbarianHuntingSkill > 0

    AcquireAncillary Pet_Falcon chance  4

          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and FactionType parthia

Trigger trigger_Warrior_Slave_01
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition TargetFactionCultureType barbarian
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= muster_field
          and Trait Trusting >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Warrior_Slave chance  5

    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition not TargetFactionCultureType barbarian
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= muster_field
          and Trait Trusting >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Warrior_Slave chance  1

Trigger trigger_CommandableGladiator_01
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction slave
          and not CultureType greek
          and Trait Trusting >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary CommandableGladiator chance  3

Trigger trigger_Clueless_Pawn_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral 
          and RandomPercent > 50

    AcquireAncillary Clueless_Pawn chance  2

    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = assassin 

    AcquireAncillary Clueless_Pawn chance  6

; Barbarian Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Lur_Players_01
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_shrine
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_fun_pantheon
          and Trait Warlord >= 1
          and FactionType germans
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Lur_Players chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Lur_Players_02
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_shrine
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_leadership_pantheon
          and Trait Warlord >= 1
          and FactionType germans
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Lur_Players chance  3

          and FactionType germans

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and FactionType gauls
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Brehon chance  4

Trigger trigger_Old_Battle_Companion_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Prudent >= 2
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and Trait BattleScarred >= 2

    AcquireAncillary Old_Battle_Companion chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Long_Separated_Friend_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Prudent >= 2
          and Attribute Management >= 3
          and Trait EducatedBarbarian >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Long_Separated_Friend chance  2 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Trusted_Friend_01
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and Trait Prudent >= 2
;;          and Attribute Influence >= 4
;;          and Trait HighPersonalSecurity >= 1
;;          and not Trait WiseWife >= 1
;;          and not Trait BarbarianBandOfBrothers >= 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Trusted_Friend chance  2 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Preserved_Heads
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and NumKilledGenerals > 0
          and Trait Bloodthirsty >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Preserved_Heads chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Carnute_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType dacia
;;		    and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = proconsuls_palace
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= gallic_annexation_3
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Carnute chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Carnute_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType dacia
;;          and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = proconsuls_palace
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= britannic_annexation_3
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Carnute chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Civilized_Emissary_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType barbarian
          and not InBarbarianLands
          and Trait Warlord > 2
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter romans_julii = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter sparta = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter pergamon = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter seleucid = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter egypt = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter macedon = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter greek_cities = AtWar

    AcquireAncillary Civilized_Emissary chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Civilized_Emissary_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Warlord > 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter romans_julii = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter sparta = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter pergamon = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter seleucid = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter egypt = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter macedon = AtWar
          and not DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter greek_cities = AtWar

    AcquireAncillary Civilized_Emissary chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_March_Driver
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory infantry
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary March_Driver chance  3

;;Trigger trigger_Shield-maiden_05
;;    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and FatherTrait WarriorWife >= 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Shield-maiden chance  50 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Healer_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_large_temple
          and Trait Hypochondriac >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Healer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Healer_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and Trait Hypochondriac >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Healer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
; Carthaginian Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Plutocrat_01
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_large_temple
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
;;          and Trait Mysterious >= 1
;;          and CultureType carthaginian
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Plutocrat chance  3 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Plutocrat_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
;;          and Trait Mysterious >= 1
;;          and CultureType carthaginian
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Plutocrat chance  1 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Agricultural_Expert_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+3
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Agricultural_Expert chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Agricultural_Expert_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_farming_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_farming_pantheon
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+3
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Agricultural_Expert chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Silver_Merchant_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
          and Trait BeingPunic >= 3
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Silver_Merchant chance  1 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Silver_Merchant_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_large_temple
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
;;          and Trait EconomicsSkill >= 1
;;          and CultureType carthaginian
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Silver_Merchant chance  1 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Numidian_Cavalry_Commander_01
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and Trait BeingBerber >= 1
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Numidian_Cavalry_Commander chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Numidian_Cavalry_Commander_02
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Numidian_Cavalry_Commander chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Tribune_Judge_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition Attribute Command > 5
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Tribune_Judge chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Trade_Union_Leader_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
          and Attribute Management > 4
          and Attribute Influence > 4
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Trade_Union_Leader chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_sacred_band_captain
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and Trait BeingPunic >= 2
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary sacred_band_captain chance  3

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon

;;          and not FactionType nabataea
          and IsGeneral

          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Carpet_weaver_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= caravan
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Carpet_weaver chance  4

Trigger trigger_Eastern_sage_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= silk_rd
          and Trait Xenophilia >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Eastern_sage chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Eastern_sage_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= silk_rd
          and Trait Xenophilia >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Eastern_sage chance  1

Trigger trigger_Prophet
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_temple
          and Trait ReligiousMania >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Prophet chance  5

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and Trait Pious >= 2
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Apocalyptic_Preacher chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Fanatic_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and Trait ReligiousMania >= 2
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Fanatic chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Zurvanist_Priest
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType seleucid
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon
          and not FactionType bosporan
          and Trait HarshJustice > 0

    AcquireAncillary Zurvanist_Priest chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Magian_Tutor
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition Trait Ignorance < 2
          and FatherTrait Ignorance < 2
          and FatherTrait Archemenid_Tradition > 0
          and not FactionType macedon
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType sparta
          and not FactionType pergamon

    AcquireAncillary Magian_Tutor chance  2

Trigger trigger_Minstrel
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType parthia
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Minstrel chance  3 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Pahlavan_Master
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and FactionType parthia
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= baths
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= parthian_annexation_4
;;          and Trait Feudalist >= 1
;;          and FactionType parthia
;;          and IsGeneral
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Pahlavan_Master chance  2 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Aramaic_Ascetic
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 60
          and Trait Pious >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Aramaic_Ascetic chance  3 


;------------------------------------------
; Egyptian Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ptolemaic_Farming_Advisor_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ludus_magnus
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+3
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= grain+1
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary Ptolemaic_Farming_Advisor chance 2

;===============================================================
;== Temple Project special TRIGGERS START HERE =================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pet_white_cat2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_hunting_awesome_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_hunting_pantheon
          and AgentType = assassin

    AcquireAncillary pet_white_cat chance  9 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_trusty_steed_05
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_temple
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_trusty_steed_06
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_temple
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and FactionType scythia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_trusty_steed_07
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_temple
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pet_monkey_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral 

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey chance  4 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_astrologer_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_shrine
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_one_god_pantheon
          and Trait Superstitious >= 1
          and FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary astrologer chance  3 


;===============================================================
;== Office Ancillaries Triggers START HERE =====================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Attribute Command > 5
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_SettlementOwner Tingi = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_01

    AcquireAncillary governor_01 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Attribute Command > 5
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_SettlementOwner Mastia = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_02

    AcquireAncillary governor_02 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Attribute Command > 5
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_03

    AcquireAncillary governor_03 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_governor_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Attribute Command > 5
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_SettlementOwner Rome = carthage
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists governor_04

    AcquireAncillary governor_04 chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Archon_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType greek_cities
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Influence > 3
          and Attribute Management > 1
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Trait Athenian = 1
          and I_SettlementOwner Athens = greek_cities
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Archon1

    AcquireAncillary Archon1 chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Archon_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType greek_cities
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Influence > 3
          and Attribute Management > 1
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and Attribute Loyalty < 4
          and Trait Spartiates >= 3
          and I_SettlementOwner Sparta = greek_cities
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Archon2

Trigger trigger_Nomarch_01_egypt
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management > 2
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 15
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Nomarch1
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Nomarch1 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Nomarch_02_egypt
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management > 2
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 30
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Nomarch2
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Nomarch2 chance 40
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Nomarch_03_egypt
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management > 2
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 45
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Nomarch3
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Nomarch3 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Nomarch_04_egypt
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management > 2
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 60
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Nomarch4
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Nomarch4 chance 10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Dioiketes
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and Attribute Management > 3
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 30
          and I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Dioiketes
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 2

    AcquireAncillary Dioiketes chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Satrap_01_pontus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType pontus
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Influence > 5
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_NumberOfSettlements pontus > 20
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists Satrap1
          and Trait Personality_Loyal >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Satrap1 chance 10
	
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType pontus
          and IsGeneral

          and Attribute Influence > 5

          and I_NumberOfSettlements pontus > 35

Trigger High_priest_of_Anahita_in_Susa
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType parthia
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Influence > 6
          and Attribute Negotiation = 0
          and I_SettlementOwner Susa = parthia
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists High_priest_of_Anahita_in_Susa
          and Trait Pious >= 1

    AcquireAncillary High_priest_of_Anahita_in_Susa chance  10

;===============================================================
;== Main Priest Ancillaries Triggers START HERE ================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Vahagan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battleforge_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_battleforge_pantheon
          and Trait Brave >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Vahagan chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Anahit
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_fun_pantheon
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Anahit chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Armazd
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_leadership_pantheon
          and Trait Personality_Honest >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType armenia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Armazd chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Andrasta
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and Trait GoodRiskyAttacker >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and not FactionType dacia
;;		    and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType scythia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Andrasta chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Tanit
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_farming_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_farming_pantheon
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Tanit chance  7

          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Mars chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest_of_Vulcan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_forge_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_forge_pantheon
          and Trait GoodEngineer >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Vulcan chance  7

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_governors_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_governors_pantheon

          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_victory_temple
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and Trait GoodRiskyAttacker >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType germans
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Wurt chance  7 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battle_temple

          and not FactionType scythia

          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and not FactionType dacia

          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType scythia
          and IsGeneral

          and SettlementBuildingExists <= temple_of_victory_pantheon
          and Trait GoodRiskyAttacker >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and FactionType scythia
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Simurgh chance  7

          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and CultureType carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Yamm chance  7

    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_naval_temple
          and CultureType carthaginian

;== TEMPLE_SP TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_temple_of_battle_large_temple_sp_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_viking_sp1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and RandomPercent < 10
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary freeman_clerk2 chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_temple_of_battle_large_temple_sp_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_viking_sp1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and RandomPercent >= 10
          and RandomPercent < 20
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary geometer chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_temple_of_battle_large_temple_sp_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_viking_sp1
          and Trait Personality_Honest >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Athena chance  7

          and RandomPercent >= 20

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_viking_sp3
          and RandomPercent < 10
          and IsGeneral

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_2_sp4
          and Trait Energetic >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Nabia chance  4

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium_sp2
          and Trait Ignorance = 0
          and RandomPercent >= 70
          and RandomPercent < 80
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary historian chance  2 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and Trait Prim >= 1
          and IsGeneral

Trigger trigger_scriptorium_sp2_10
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium_sp2
          and Trait Personality_Honest >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest_of_Athena chance  4

;===============================================================
;== UNIQUE ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE =======================
;===============================================================

;===============================================================
;== XGM UNIQUE ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ===================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
; Vanilla Greek's Unique Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_appolonius_of_perge_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  70 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Superstitious >= 1

    AcquireAncillary appolonius_of_perge chance  40 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_appolonius_of_perge_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  70 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and Trait Superstitious >= 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary appolonius_of_perge chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_appolonius_of_perge_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= west_natives
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  70 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and Trait Superstitious >= 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary appolonius_of_perge chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_appolonius_of_rhodes_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  10 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  130 
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Attribute Influence > 4

    AcquireAncillary appolonius_of_rhodes chance  40

Trigger trigger_nicander
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_awesome_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  220 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  320 
          and Trait HaleAndHearty >= 1
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1

    AcquireAncillary nicander chance  40

;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= west_natives
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  0 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  22 
;;          and Attribute Influence > 4
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary strato chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_strato_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  0 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  22 
;;          and Attribute Influence > 4

;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_theocritus_of_syracuse_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= lyceum
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >= 0 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary theocritus_of_syracuse chance  40

Trigger trigger_terrence_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  210 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  280 
          and Trait NonAuthoritarian >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary terrence chance  40
