; Vanilla Roman only Unique Ancillaries
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_quintus_lutatius_catulus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_plumbing
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= curia
          and CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  310 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  400 
          and Attribute Influence > 7

    AcquireAncillary quintus_lutatius_catulus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_gaius_valerius_catullus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  432 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  452 
          and Trait Patrician >= 2 

    AcquireAncillary gaius_valerius_catullus chance  40

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_awesome_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  132 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  192 
          and Trait Energetic >= 2

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Joker >= 1
          and Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  416 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  456

Trigger trigger_ti_sempronius_gracchus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Populares > 0
          and FactionwideAncillaryExists ti_sempronius_gracchus_the_elder
          and Trait Rabblerouser >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary ti_sempronius_gracchus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and CultureType roman
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Populares > 0
          and FactionwideAncillaryExists ti_sempronius_gracchus_the_elder
          and Trait Rabblerouser >= 1

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Populares > 0
          and Trait NonAuthoritarian >= 1 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary ti_sempronius_gracchus_the_elder chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_livy
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait BeingRoman >= 2
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  472 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  526 
          and Trait Generous >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary livy chance  40 

	
;===============================================================
;== XC UNIQUE ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ====================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
; Barbarian Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
; Gallic Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Diviciacus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType dacia
;;		    and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  420 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  500 
          and Trait BarbarianOralTradition >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Diviciacus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Aneroestes&Concolitanus
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries
    Condition InBarbarianLands
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  80 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  120 

    AcquireAncillary Aneroestes&Concolitanus chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ducarius
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries
    Condition InBarbarianLands
          and not FactionType dacia
;;		    and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType scythia
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  160 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  210 

    AcquireAncillary Ducarius chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Cathbad
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not FactionType germans
          and not FactionType dacia
;;		    and not FactionType illyria
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType scythia
          and SettlementName Tara
          and SettlementBuildingExists = proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >= 320 
          and I_TurnNumber <= 400 
          and Trait BarbarianBardicSkill >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Cathbad chance  40

; Thracian Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Deceneus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType dacia
          and SettlementBuildingExists = temple_of_law_awesome_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  380 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  472 
          and Trait Warlord >= 3 

    AcquireAncillary Deceneus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Zoltes
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition Attribute Command >= 4
          and FactionType thrace
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  140 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 

    AcquireAncillary Zoltes chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType thrace

          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  80 
          and Trait EducatedBarbarian >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Sotades chance  40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Abelox
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType spain
          and DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter romans_julii = Allied
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  140 

    AcquireAncillary Abelox chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Rhetogenes_Caraunios
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SallyBesieger
          and FactionType spain
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  280 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  330 

    AcquireAncillary Rhetogenes_Caraunios chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Audax_Ditalcus_Minurus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType spain
          and SettlementBuildingExists = farms+2
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  280 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  330 
          and Trait Warlord >= 3 

    AcquireAncillary Audax_Ditalcus_Minurus chance  20

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsUnderSiege
          and FactionType spain
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  250 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  300 

    AcquireAncillary Megaravicus chance  40

          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and FactionType spain
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  220 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  300

          and RemainingMPPercentage < 20
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  170

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Herillus_of_Carthage
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
;;          and FactionType carthage
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
;;          and Trait GoodOrganizer >= 1 
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Herillus_of_Carthage chance  40 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Mago
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+3
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  200 
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Mago chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hanno_the_Great
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter romans_julii = AtWar
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  60 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
          and Trait PoliticsSkill >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Hanno_the_Great chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hannibal_the_Rhodian
    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= shipwright
          and FactionType carthage
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  80 

    AcquireAncillary Hannibal_the_Rhodian chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Xanthippus_of_Carthage
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries
    Condition not InBarbarianLands
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  80 
          and Trait Negotiation >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Xanthippus_of_Carthage chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ampsicora
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Caralis
	      and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and DiplomaticStanceFromCharacter romans_julii = AtWar
          and FactionType carthage
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  160 

    AcquireAncillary Ampsicora chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
; Egyptian Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Ganymedes
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  400 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  500 
          and Trait HighPersonalSecurity >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Ganymedes chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Aristonicus_01
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    Condition FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  160 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  220 
          and Trait HighPersonalSecurity >= 1 

    AcquireAncillary Aristonicus chance  40

Trigger trigger_Agathoclea&Agathocles
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType egypt
          and Attribute Management < 3
          and IsFactionLeader
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  160 
          and Trait Perverted >= 2 

    AcquireAncillary Agathoclea&Agathocles chance  40

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType egypt
          and Attribute Management > 3
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  60 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  120 

    AcquireAncillary Zenon chance  40

	  and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and FactionType egypt

          and IsFactionLeader
          and I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  160 
          and Trait Lewd >= 2

Trigger trigger_Manetho_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait BeingEgyptian > 0
          and FactionType egypt
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  80 
          and not Trait PublicAtheism >= 1
          and not Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 2
          and not Trait Sacrilegious >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Manetho chance  40

; Babylonian Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Sudines
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  40 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  100 
          and Trait Superstitious >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Sudines chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Seleucus_of_Seleucia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  220 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  300 
          and Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Seleucus_of_Seleucia chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Isidore_of_Charax
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  480 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  540 
          and Trait Scout >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Isidore_of_Charax chance  40 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  10 
          and Trait PhilosophySkill >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Berossus chance  40

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  200 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  300 
          and Trait Unjust >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Artapanus_of_Alexandria chance  40 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType macedon
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  200 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  300 
          and Trait Unjust >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Artapanus_of_Alexandria chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Yose_ben_Yoezer_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_2_sp5
          and Trait BeingJewish > 0
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  40 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  100 
          and Trait Xenophilia >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Hillel_the_Elder chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Yose_ben_Yoezer_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_horse_2_sp5
          and not FactionType greek_cities
          and not FactionType macedon
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  40 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  100 
          and Trait Xenophilia >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Yose_ben_Yoezer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
; Phoenician Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Antipater_of_Sidon
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  260 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  306 
          and Trait RhetoricSkill >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Antipater_of_Sidon chance  40

; Roman Unique Ancillaries Trigger

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Lucius_Afranius
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Populares > 0
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  400 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  480 
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Lucius_Afranius chance  40

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Populares > 0
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  510 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  594 
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1

Trigger trigger_Marcus_Vitruvius_Pollio
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= catapult_range
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  440 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  530 
          and Trait GoodSiegeAttacker >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Marcus_Vitruvius_Pollio chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Cassius_Dionysius_of_Utica
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition TargetFactionCultureType greek
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  210 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  290 
          and Trait GoodFarmer >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Cassius_Dionysius_of_Utica chance  40

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ludus_magnus
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_plumbing
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  368 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  506 
          and Trait NaturalPhilosophySkill >= 1

          and not Trait HatesCarthaginian >= 1

; Faction-based Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Deimachus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and FactionType seleucid
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  30 
          and Trait RhetoricSkill >= 1
          and Attribute Influence > 4

    AcquireAncillary Deimachus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Eudoxus_of_Cyzicus
    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard
          and FactionType egypt
          and I_TurnNumber >=  260 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  360 

    AcquireAncillary Eudoxus_of_Cyzicus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Polyxenidas
    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard
          and FactionType seleucid
          and I_TurnNumber >=  130 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  200 

    AcquireAncillary Polyxenidas chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Cineas
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  20 
          and CultureType greek

    AcquireAncillary Cineas chance  40

Trigger trigger_Lycortas_of_Megalopolis_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = family
          and I_TurnNumber >=  160 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  260 
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and Trait RhetoricSkill > 0

    AcquireAncillary Lycortas_of_Megalopolis chance  40

Trigger trigger_Zenodotus_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium_sp1
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  20 
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and Trait Prim >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Zenodotus chance  40

Trigger trigger_Geminus_of_Rhodes_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= ludus_magnus
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  400 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  500 
          and Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Geminus_of_Rhodes chance  40

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  220 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  320 
          and Trait Personality_Pragmatic >= 1

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  40 
          and Attribute Management > 2

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Trait GoodBuilder >= 1

; Epicurean Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hermarchus_of_Mytilene_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= odeon
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Trait Epicurean >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Hermarchus_of_Mytilene chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hermarchus_of_Mytilene_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= odeon
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Trait Epicurean >= 1

;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= odeon
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  380 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  480 
;;          and Trait Epicurean >= 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Philodemus_of_Gadara chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
; Stoic Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Cleanthes_of_Assos_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  100 
          and Trait Personality_Stoic >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Cleanthes_of_Assos chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Cleanthes_of_Assos_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  100 
          and Trait Personality_Stoic >= 1

Trigger trigger_Clearchus_of_Soli_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  40  
          and Attribute Influence > 3

    AcquireAncillary Clearchus_of_Soli chance  40

;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral

; Writer&Grammarist Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Aratus_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  80 
          and Trait PoeticSkill >= 1

    AcquireAncillary Aratus chance  40

;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

Trigger trigger_Damophon_01
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  160 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  360 
          and Trait Aesthetic > 1

    AcquireAncillary Damophon chance  40

;;Trigger trigger_Damophon_02
;;    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Damophon chance  20

;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  360 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  460 
;;          and Trait BarbarianCraftandArt > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Alexandros_of_Antioch chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Alexandros_of_Antioch_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  360 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  460 
;;          and Trait BarbarianCraftandArt > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Alexandros_of_Antioch chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Chares_of_Lindos_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Attribute Influence > 5

    AcquireAncillary Chares_of_Lindos chance  40 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Chares_of_Lindos_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= west_natives
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
;;          and Attribute Influence > 5
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Chares_of_Lindos chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Chares_of_Lindos_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
;;          and Attribute Influence > 5
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Chares_of_Lindos chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Epigonus_of_Pergamum_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  60 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  160 
          and Trait VictorRomanVirtue > 1

    AcquireAncillary Epigonus_of_Pergamum chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Epigonus_of_Pergamum_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  60 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  160 
          and Trait VictorOthersVirtue > 1

    AcquireAncillary Epigonus_of_Pergamum chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
; Others Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Hippalus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= port
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  360 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  460 
          and Trait GoodTrader > 1

    AcquireAncillary Hippalus chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Lagoras
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries
    Condition I_TurnNumber >=  100 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  200 
          and Trait Despoiler > 1

    AcquireAncillary mercenary_captain chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Kleitomachos_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= baths
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  120 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
          and Trait HaleAndHearty > 1

    AcquireAncillary Kleitomachos chance  40 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Kleitomachos_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= west_natives
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  120 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
;;          and Trait HaleAndHearty > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Kleitomachos chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Kleitomachos_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  120 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  180 
;;          and Trait HaleAndHearty > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Kleitomachos chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Lycinus_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stone_wall
          and not CultureType barbarian
          and IsGeneral
          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
          and Trait GoodDefender > 1

    AcquireAncillary Lycinus chance  40 

;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Lycinus_02
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= west_natives
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
;;          and Trait GoodDefender > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Lycinus chance  20 
;;
;;;------------------------------------------
;;Trigger trigger_Lycinus_03
;;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;;    Condition EndedInSettlement
;;          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
;;          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
;;          and Trait PartialCivilized = 1
;;          and IsGeneral
;;          and I_TurnNumber >=  1 
;;          and I_TurnNumber <=  60 
;;          and Trait GoodDefender > 1
;;
;;    AcquireAncillary Lycinus chance  20 
;;
;------------------------------------------
; Artifact Unique Ancillaries Trigger
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_achilles_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementName Halikarnassos
          and Trait Insane > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_achilles chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_achilles_02
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementName Halikarnassos
          and Trait Deranged > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_achilles chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_achilles_03
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementName Halikarnassos
          and Trait ReligiousMania > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_achilles chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_achilles_04
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementName Halikarnassos
          and Trait Sacrilegious > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_achilles chance  10 
;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_leech
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait BlackBileHumour > 0
	    and Trait Hypochondriac > 0
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary leech chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_leech2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait YellowBileHumour > 0
	    and Trait Hypochondriac > 0
          and FactionType greek_cities
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary leech2 chance 50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_noble_steed
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral > 0
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary noble_steed chance 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_disgruntled_insider
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and Trait GoodSpy < 4

    AcquireAncillary disgruntled_insider chance 2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_imaginary_friend
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition Trait Insane > 0

    AcquireAncillary imaginary_friend chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_blind_prophet
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait TouchedByTheGods > 0
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary blind_prophet chance 1
